post.body: And no CGI. Keep him a puppet.

My So Called Life...God, I loved that show.... on second thought...cancel that...They'd kill it... Wiseguy with Ke Wahl...the first season would make a great movie...too bad Ray Sharkey is dead...he was phenomenal in that show
so pretty much anything on HBO

not JOhn From Cincinatti...or that polygamist show...what is the name of that show...Christ, I even watch it....something Love... If Sex and the City is a hit...The boys from Entourage should join jump on that bandwagon now

This may sound terrible, but with the success of the 40-Year Old Virgin, Knocked Up and Superbad, I would LOVE to see a Freaks & Geeks movie. Pick up with the Weir family reunion. The cast would be AMAZING: Directed and produced by Paul Feig and Judd Apatow (original creators) Seth Rogan Linda Cardellini James Franco Jason Segel John Frances Daley Martin Starr Joe Flaherty Samm Levine Busy Philipps Since it only go one season, we could find out what happened to Lindsey after she gets on the bus, see what the Freaks have done with their lives, etc. I would love to see that happen.
I thought HBO already made their own movies. home box office. home where you live.
